name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese. Cook bacon until crispy, then add minced garlic. Toss cooked spaghetti with the egg mixture and bacon. Season with black pepper and salt.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour. Cook chicken in a pan until browned. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add tomato puree and spices, then simmer. Add chicken and cream. Garnish with cilantro.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Warm taco shells. Fill shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and onion. Top with sour cream and salsa.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions. Heat sesame oil in a pan. Sauté garlic and ginger. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender. Add soy sauce. Serve over rice.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cream butter and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Fold in chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Preheat grill. Brush salmon with olive oil. Season with garlic, dill, salt, and pepper. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side. Squeeze lemon juice over the top before serving.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
instructions: Cook lasagna noodles. Sauté vegetables with garlic and onion. Layer noodles, ricotta, vegetables, and tomato sauce in a baking dish. Top with mozzarella. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl. Add milk and eggs, then whisk until smooth. Heat a pan with butter. Pour batter onto the pan. Cook until bubbles form, then flip. Serve with maple syrup.

name: Beef Burger
instructions: Form ground beef into patties. Grill or fry patties until cooked. Toast burger buns. Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, ketchup, mustard, and pickles.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill or cook chicken breast. Chop romaine lettuce. Toss lettuce with croutons, Parmesan, and Caesar dressing. Slice chicken and place on top. Squeeze lemon juice and sprinkle black pepper.
